author: sproul
content: the way I've always understood gossip clock disparity is that you accept messages based on what the oldest allowable/newest allowable slot would be with the tolerance. So in this case the minimum is `slot(previous_epoch.start_slot() - 500ms)` i.e. `previous_epoch.start_slot() - 1`. And the maximum is `slot(current_epoch.end_slot() + 500ms)` i.e. `current_epoch.end_slot() + 1`. This does seem a little strange

author: m.kalinin
content: In this particular case it is impossible to hit the minimum while the maximum is theoretically possible but not sure if it is useful. I think the disparity is rather applicable to short ranges, in this case it doesn't seem to matter that much
